full_summary: ### Risk Assessment Scoring Tool (RAST) Tender Announcement #### English #### French Table of Contents ================= * [Announcement Overview](#announcement-overview) * [Contract Information](#contract-information) * [Background and Context](#background-and-context) * [Respondents' Requirements and Conditions](#respondents-requirements-and-conditions) * [Notice URL] (#notice-url) #### Announcement Overview This is an amendment to the original tender announcement for the provision of a Risk Assessment Scoring Tool (RAST) Gap Analysis and Recommendations. #### Contract Information * **Tender Reference Number**: WS4348408527-Doc4348549255 * **Tender Closing Date**: January 12, 2024, 14:00 EST. * **Posting Notice Date**: December 11, 2023 * **Expected Contract Start Date**: None * **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024 * **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) #### Background and Context The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) has a requirement for conducting a gap analysis of the Risk Assessment Scoring Tool (RAST) and providing recommendations in accordance with the Statement of Work – Annex A. The maximum budget to complete the work is $137,500.00 (including taxes). #### Respondents' Requirements and Conditions Respondents are required to submit their bids, along with all necessary supporting documentation, before the closing date of January 12, 2024, at 14:00 EST. **Important Note:** Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive. The requirement includes options for the implementation of recommendations, training, and technical support. The successful bidder must complete the work by March 31, 2024. #### Notice URL [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18245740?extsite=MTgyNDU3NDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18245740?extsite=MTgyNDU3NDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
